DOC.brief_summary: Clinical intervention overweight moderately obeses adult . The objective trial demonstrate superior eficacy Alphagos placebo weight loss low-calorie diet 12 week . The superiority judge body weight . Change cardiometabolic risk factor intervention evaluate secondary endpoint
DOC.brief_title: Effect Alpha-galacto-oligasaccharides Weight Loss Overweight Moderately Obeses Adults : A Randomized Controlled Double Blinded Trial Versus Placebo
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index > equal 25 < 35 Use effective contraception woman childbearing age Pregnant woman ( positive pregnancy test ) breastfeed Antihypertensive cholesterol treatment HIV infection HCV Hepatic and/or severe renal failure Heart attack within 6 month prior selection Heart failure know Inflammatory disease know Cancer cancer within 3 year prior study except basal cell skin cancer Diabetes define blood glucose great equal 1.26 g/L Gastrointestinal disease know Bariatric surgery
